content: Xiao Han is a first-year Ph.D. student at University of Surreyunder the supervision of Prof. Tao Xiang. He obtained his bachelor’s degree at Zhejiang Universityin 2020. He has several academic experiences at University of Michigan, Westlake Universityand Fudan University.

title: Xiao (Brandon) Han

authors: Xiao Han | Sen He | Li Zhang | Tao Xiang
summary: Solve the data scarcity problem in TBPS through transfer learning and contrastive learning
title: Text-Based Person Search with Limited Data

authors: _Xiao Han_* | Ziyang Fan* | Zeyang Liu* | Chao Li | L. Jay Guo
summary: Interdisciplinary AI application in metasurface designing
title: Inverse Design of Metasurface Optical Filters Using Deep Neural Network With High Degrees of Freedom
